column4: someone know how to install ONDA modem driver MW875UP a MAC without Intel chip?
someone know how to install ONDA modem driver MW875UP a MAC without Intel chip or this will work on UBUNTO instaled ppc?
No need to repeat so soon; if someone with experience & time to help you is about, they'll answer in time :)
Bear in mind if it's a WinModem (i.e. a fake modem where a lot of the work is done by the software drivers) rather than a real modem, then Linux support is often shaky at best
